game.name: CASE RECORDS: Lost Night
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: CASE RECORDS is a series of psychological horror games that are part of the CASE: Animatronics and CASE 2: Animatronics Survival universe.
game.shortDescriptionEn: CASE RECORDS is a series of psychological horror games that are part of the CASE: Animatronics and CASE 2: Animatronics Survival universe.
